ModMetaData.name: Tribal Medicine Add-On - Medical Pills
ModMetaData.author: LadyCookie
ModMetaData.description:
An add-on for √Årgon's Tribal Medicine mod. LOAD AFTER THAT MOD.
- This mod allows you to create pills with the same effects as the Flu, Immunity, Curative and Digestive teas from the original mod. - Pills have the advantage of not giving a mood debuff. They can be made by combining a medical tea with 2 Neutroamine at the drug lab. - Require the "Pills" technology (1000 Industrial), which also require the Drug Production technology. Also changes the original herbal tea technology to 2000 neolithic science.
